channel.title: CVE Feed for BracketSpace -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BracketSpace -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37562|2024-07-23T15:05:26.030Z -- bracketspace -- simple%20post%20notes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BracketSpace Simple Post Notes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Post Notes: from n/a through 1.7.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-31926|2024-06-04T17:37:05.749Z -- bracketspace -- advanced%20cron%20manager%20%E2%80%93%20debug%20%26%20control
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BracketSpace Advanced Cron Manager – debug & control allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Advanced Cron Manager – debug & control: from n/a through 2.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-31935|2024-06-04T17:36:32.096Z -- bracketspace -- simple%20post%20notes
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in BracketSpace Simple Post Notes.This issue affects Simple Post Notes: from n/a through 1.7.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-37562|2024-07-20T09:15:39.923Z -- bracketspace -- simple%20post%20notes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BracketSpace Simple Post Notes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Post Notes: from n/a through 1.7.7.
